body_html:
Good news. I have managed to localize the issue (haven't fix yet) and MLK build now runs natively on my Mac!!!
The issue is in the tensorflow lite, which I don't use at the moment. So I commented out it's import from contrib's init # from tensorflow.contrib.lite.python import lite and I got max performance of my i7 CPU

Performance:
images/sec: 5.1
(this is 3.92x gain)

I will setup clean VM and figure out exact build steps and will post them along with PR that fixes build

body:
Good news. I have managed to localize the issue (haven't fix yet) and MLK build now runs natively on my Mac!!!
The issue is in the tensorflow lite, which I don't use at the moment. So I commented out it's import from contrib's __init__ `# from tensorflow.contrib.lite.python import lite` and I got max performance of my i7 CPU
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3339485/36704859-2611de50-1b17-11e8-8110-614b2aef3b39.png)

Performance: 
images/sec: 5.1
(this is 3.92x gain)

I will setup clean VM and figure out exact build steps and will post them along with PR that fixes build
